title: Wind 10 Taskbar additional task on right click
author: milika
body_snippet:
<!-- Feature Request -->
Would be great to have Windows 10 additional icons within task-bar pin of mRemoteNG. (right click on its)
Similar to this:
![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1072578/25674160/2c8d3e28-303a-11e7-811c-14119d0eb761.png)

Currently it just shows this:
![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1072578/25674174/3861e2da-303a-11e7-8532-8e6a2b9d7d48.png)

List of connections, perhaps few last used ones etc...

Regards...

iterations.description: Jumplist support is a valid enhancement request for WinForms apps on Windows 10+ with a known implementation path via WindowsAPICodePack

comments.author: farosch
comments.snippet:
Dev note:
These are called `Jumplists` and normally these do not exist for WinForm applications.
This might be worth investigating, though:
https://www.codeproject.com/Articles/103913/How-to-Create-a-Custom-Jumplist-with-Custom-Events

notes:
AI triage: Jumplist support is a valid enhancement request for WinForms apps on Windows 10+ with a known implementation path via WindowsAPICodePack
Approach: Use Windows API Code Pack (Microsoft.WindowsAPICodePack.Shell) to add a custom JumpList with recent/frequent connections and quick-connect actions to the taskbar icon on application startup
